site_description: Agent Consulting from the heart of Europe on a fantastic day. OpenClaw expert and contributor based in Berlin.
hero_tagline: Agent Consulting from the heart of Europe on a fantastic day.
hero_bio: I'm Philip, passionate OpenClaw user and contributor based in Berlin. I help companies deploy AI agents effectively.
service_installation_desc: Setup, configuration and deployment of OpenClaw for your team.
service_consulting_desc: Architecture, strategy and best practices for agent systems.
service_training_desc: Workshops and onboarding for your team.
service_talks_desc: Conference talks and company presentations about AI agents.
offering_personal_tagline: Your setup, your API keys, your control.
offering_personal_description: Not another subscription, an actual system that's yours. Your own AI infrastructure — running on your hardware or a small server, connected to the AI provider of your choice.
offering_personal_item_1: Full OpenClaw installation on your Mac, PC, or a cheap VPS
offering_personal_item_2: Bring your own AI — connect to OpenAI, Anthropic, Mistral, or run local models
offering_personal_item_3: Custom personality — serious assistant, witty companion, or something in between
offering_personal_item_4: Persistent memory — it remembers your projects, preferences, and past conversations
offering_personal_item_5: Tool integrations — calendar, notes, browser, whatever you actually use
offering_personal_item_6: Messaging access — talk to it via Telegram, Signal, or WhatsApp
offering_personal_item_7: 1-hour onboarding call — we set it up together, you leave knowing how to use it
offering_personal_for_you_1: You want an AI that's yours — your setup, your API keys, your control
offering_personal_for_you_2: You've tried ChatGPT but want something that remembers and does things
offering_personal_for_you_3: You want integrations with your actual tools, not a chat window
offering_personal_for_you_4: You're curious about AI agents and want hands-on experience
offering_personal_price_note: Plus your own AI provider costs — typically €20-50/month depending on usage
offering_company_description: Not another SaaS tool your team ignores. This is AI infrastructure that plugs into your existing workflows — your systems, your data, your providers.
offering_company_item_1: OpenClaw deployment — on-premise, cloud, or hybrid. Your infrastructure, your rules.
offering_company_item_2: Bring your own AI — OpenAI, Anthropic, Mistral, Azure, or self-hosted models
offering_company_item_3: Multi-agent setup — dedicated agents for different teams or functions
offering_company_item_4: System integrations — Slack, email, Jira, CRM, internal tools, APIs
offering_company_item_5: Custom workflows — automate repetitive processes your team wastes hours on
offering_company_item_6: Team onboarding workshop — hands-on training so your team actually uses it
offering_company_item_7: Security & compliance review — data stays where you need it to stay
offering_company_for_you_1: Your team spends hours on tasks AI could handle in minutes
offering_company_for_you_2: You want AI that works inside your systems, not in a separate chat window
offering_company_for_you_3: You need control over data, providers, and infrastructure
offering_company_for_you_4: You're ready to move beyond 'we should look into AI' to actually deploying it
offering_company_price_note: Includes architecture, deployment, and team onboarding. Scope and pricing adjusted to your team size and needs.
